thread.title: Monica Nahmias
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Monica Nahmias

author: Monica Nahmias
title: Monica Nahmias
text: Otticanet is amazing. Not only do they have an excellent selection and great prices their customer service is fantastic. I ordered a pair of jimmy choo sunglasses that ended up being backordered. Right away I was emailed and told it would take a little longer and was given an additional 5 percent off. I loved that they were on top of it and took the time to care and keep me updated. They ended up coming faster the anticipated and I loved them! I will definitely definitely order again!
